profile:
Mold Detection & Removal (Mold Inspections and Mold Removal) (Mould Inspections and Mould Removal)
We are a IICRC Certified Firm (the Gold Standard in Restoration). Our Mold Inspections, Indoor Air Quality Testing and Mold Removal services in Toronto and the surrounding GTA have been developed with years of practical experience and ongoing education. Our goal is to provide great service above and beyond that of our competitors.
 
From the first call to project end you can expect:
 
+ Easy Communication
+ Honesty
+ Reliability
+ Trouble Free Process
+ A Commitment of Excellence
+ A team that strives to save you Time, Money and most important, disruption to your personal life or place of business.
 
At The Mold Guy we’re not satisfied, unless you are! The Mold Guy prides itself in being your ethical Mold Inspections and Mold Removal professionals for Toronto and the surrounding GTA.
 
Once you suspect a Mold problem and make that first call you will talk to one of our Mold Professionals that can quickly help you understand the extent of the problem and schedule a Mold Inspection at a convenient time for you. We make the process systematic and most of all, calm and efficient.
Our Mold Detection (mould detection) Service starts with a Certified Mold Professional onsite to evaluate the extent of any Mold related problems. 
Our Mold Inspectors will educate with mold facts which hopefully helps you relax and understand what’s next. 
We will provide a written quote and go over the scope of repairs with you and make sure all your concerns have been addressed.
At The Mold Guy from top to bottom beginning to end, taking pride in what we do is our standard. We really do care! We’re not going to send anyone to work in your home or business that we wouldn't want working in ours. We believe in taking care of your home as we would take care of ours. Therefore as a company, we know you are getting the highest level of care and service which starts by talking to a company representative that knows Mold, not an answering service. We look forward to hearing from you!

profile:
Voted Best Home Inspection Company in Toronto by Home Stars!

Best Of HomeStars! - 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019!

If you are looking for a reliable and qualified home inspection company with the best services in the Toronto area, only trust the experts at Allmax. Here at Allmax Home Inspections we are the trusted source for home buyers in the area, and we make sure our clients make informed decisions before making the biggest purchase of their lives. Visit: http://allmaxhomes.ca for pricing information. Our team of expert inspectors will be able to see what the other guys can't! We are trained in mold detection and removal. If you are concerned your dream house might be hiding something, make sure to call the experts at Allmax and avoid a nasty surprise! Founded in 2005, AllMax Home and Property Inspections has quickly grown to be the premier inspection service for residential and business properties in the greater Toronto area. We take a customer first approach with our detailed reports and personal touch on each one of our inspections. Our company only hires experienced inspectors that have both inspector experience, as well as building experience for our residential and commercial properties. As the leader in Toronto home inspection services, we here at Allmax will continue to provide to top rated inspection services from our team of experienced inspectors. No matter if you are a first time buyer or looking for investment properties trust the experts at Allmax with your Toronto home inspection. Come see the difference a HomeStars award winning inspector can make to the purchase of your dream home and give the professionals a visit on our website at http://allmaxhomes.ca for more information.

profile:
IICRC Certified (Mould Remediation)
IAC2 Certified  (Mould / Asbestos Analysis)
MTCU Certified 253W & 253S (Asbestos Abatement) for Type 1, Type 2 & Type 3 Asbestos Abatement.
 
DISPOSAL DOCUMENTS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: DELIVERY TICKET, MANIFEST / BILL OF LADING & WEIGH SCALE TICKET.
 
Mold & Asbestos Removal. Home Inspection, Vermiculite Removal, Attic Insulation Removal, Vermiculite Insulation, Vermiculite Analysis, Vermiculite Testing
_______________________________________________________________
Templar Mould and Asbestos Analysis & Removal creates healthier environments in homes and workplaces.
 
It's not an easy job and Templar developed a three-step process to make sure your home or business becomes a healthier and more comfortable place to be.
 
Trained and qualified mould and asbestos inspectors find and determine the extent of any mould and asbestos problems.
 
Air sampling and testing specimens helps to determine the best option for removal.
 
We have different options for removal, depending on what's required. All are safe, clean and done with minimum interruption to your home life or business functions.
 
Why Choose Templar?
 
Experienced - Over a decade of Mould Remediation & Asbestos Abatement.
 
Certified - Templar has earned a wide variety of industry standard certification.
IICRC Certified (Mould Remediation)
IAC2 Certified  (Mould / Asbestos Analysis)
MTCU Certified 253W & 253S (Asbestos  /  Vermiculite Abatement)
		
Guaranteed - Templar's Mould and Asbestos Verification options guarantees that you no longer have mould spores or asbestos in your home or business.
 
Put simply, mould and asbestos poison your indoor environments. You need a clean, safe and effective way of making the places where you live and work healthier and more comfortable.

profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.

profile:
Ranked Best of 2020, we are a professional mold / asbestos / viral / lead inspection, disinfection and removal company active within Southern Ontario. 

We are the only company to offer inspectors who are certified both as mold inspectors as well as certified home inspectors, (CaNACHI). With this level of knowledge we can provide you will insights others can't. 

We offer three (3) hour turnaround times during regular business hours for inspections...with this level of customer service it's easy to see why we are the best at what we do.  

 

And we pay special attention to the challenges you face when you are concerned about your families health.
 
Maintaining a healthy indoor environment can easily be done with help from our trained and experienced professionals. The air you and your family breathe may be contaminated with black mold spores and other contaminants and dangerous particles. The only way you will know for sure is to have the air in your home inspected. We will be able to provide you with the solutions you need to insure you are breathing fresh and healthy air. When you work with us, you work with specialists who are seasoned, knowledgeable, and who regularly keep up with learning about the latest trends being made in the industry.
  
Our reconstruction teams are licensed City of Toronto contractors and we are also approved by the Province of Ontario’s GreenON Funding, something you will not find any other mold removal company has.

Our professional approach includes the following:
 
-Showing up promptly for your appointment, and prepared with the materials and the latest moisture detection and thermography tools we need.
-Respect for your home and personal belongings
-A thorough examination of your potential contamination issue
-Effective solutions based on the particular problem found in your home
-Professionals ready to address all of your questions and concerns
-Use of high-quality testing equipment and gear for accurate results
-Timely service that doesn’t keep you waiting
 
Take the next step and give us a call today. We thank you for your interest in our services, and we look forward to hearing from you soon and helping to improve the air that you breathe each and every single day!

profile:
CO2 Solutions offers mold removal and asbestos removal services for industrial, commercial and residential cleaning. We serve customers in Ajax ON, Aurora ON, Belleville ON, Bowmanville ON, Brampton ON, Clarington ON, Cobourg ON, Concord ON, Courtice ON, Lindsay ON, Maple ON, Markham ON, Newmarket ON, North York ON, Oshawa ON, Peterborough ON, Pickering ON, Port Hope ON, Richmond Hill ON, Toronto ON, Whitby ON, and Woodbridge ON.

Dry ice blasting is far superior to traditional cleaning methods such as sandblasting, pressure washing and chemical cleaning. CO2 Solutions uses Coldjet Inc. single hose blasting equipment, which is the most advanced product on the market.

At CO2 Solutions, our goal is to offer our clients the latest in cutting edge blasting technology with a high degree of customer satisfaction.

Mould Inspections and Remediation
Indoor Air Quality

Dry Ice Blasting

profile: Ontario Insulation is a privately owned and family operated Canadian company.  We have serviced the insulation needs of commercial and residential clients throughout Ontario since 1963.  In 1985 we added asbestos, mold and lead abatement to our list of services.  We have established a reputation of completing projects safely, on time and within budget for an extensive list of customers.   All estimates are prepared in-house and free of charge with the specific needs of the customer and project details taken into account.
